books.author: by Diana Gabaldon
books.description: Claire Randall, an English nurse, is transported back to 1743 during a second honeymoon in the Scottish Highlands. There she begins an affair with James Fraser, a redheaded soldier. Originally published in 1991.
books.name: OUTLANDER

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: Three couples struggle with intimacy one summer at Cedar Cove’s Rose Harbor Inn.
books.name: LOVE LETTERS

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: Who will end up dead, and how, when three mothers with children in the same school become friends?
books.name: BIG LITTLE LIES

books.author: by James Rollins
books.description: The 10th Sigma Force novel offers Nazis, an ancient secret, a ticking nuclear clock and alien life-forms.
books.name: THE 6TH EXTINCTION

books.author: by Haruki Murakami
books.name: COLORLESS TSUKURU TAZAKI AND HIS YEARS OF PILGRIMAGE

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: An innocent college student falls in love with a tortured man with particular sexual tastes; the first of a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by Christina Baker Kline
books.description: A historical novel about orphans swept off the streets of New York and sent to the Midwest in the 1920s.
books.name: ORPHAN TRAIN

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: In this e-book short story, Jack Reacher is on a summer hike when the trail is suddenly closed and the military police show up.
books.name: NOT A DRILL

books.author: by Daniel Silva
books.description: Gabriel Allon, an art restorer and occasional spy for the Israeli secret service, must track down a famous missing painting by Caravaggio.
books.name: THE HEIST

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Diana Gabaldon
books.description: Volume 2 of the Outlander series, about an 18th-century Scottish warrior and a time-traveling World War II-era nurse; first published in 1992.
books.name: DRAGONFLY IN AMBER

books.author: by James Patterson and David Ellis
books.description: Searching for her sister’s killer, a former F.B.I. researcher finds a link between scores of unsolved cases.
books.name: INVISIBLE

books.author: by Deborah Harkness
books.description: In the conclusion to the All Souls trilogy, the Oxford scholar/witch Diana Bishop and the vampire geneticist Matthew Clairmont return from Elizabethan London to the present.
books.name: THE BOOK OF LIFE
